roleset.name: to strike or beat with or as if with a club

example.name: transitive
example.text: A splinter group demonstrated in Pushkin Square , where the police clubbed and detained a number of protesters [*T*-1] .

roleset.note: Frames file for 'club' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Frames created by Olga

roleset.name: thickening process of soft tissue
roleset.note: Based on Sharp data. No comparison. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie

example.name: with an arg M
example.text: Extensive clubbing of the nail beds
